title: Tour of Flanders: Pogačar Blows Van der Poel’s Legs off, Soloes to Sensational Victory
content:
'Tadej was simply the strongest': Pogačar unleashes attacking storm before launching decisive haymaker 18km from the line on the Oude Kwarement.

Read the full article at Tour of Flanders: Pogačar Blows Van der Poel’s Legs off, Soloes to Sensational Victory on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
